casebody.data:
John J. SUMAS, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
HANOVER 3201 REALTY, L.L.C, Defendant-Respondent. Maria Esposito, Plaintiff
v.
Hanover 3201 Realty, L.L.C, Township of Hanover, and the Planning Board of the Township of Hanover, Defendants. C-987 September Term 2016
079371 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-2571/3238-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
